alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Greenville and northern Pickens Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Hendersonville to 15 miles north of Pickens to 10 miles southwest of Brevard. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pickens, Travelers Rest, Slater-Marietta, Paris Mountain State Park, Tigerville, Pleasant Ridge State Park, Jocassee Gorges, Jones Gap State Park, Lake Jocassee and Keowee Toxaway State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains
